content.description: Masterbiner is the premiere route of Tam O', one that would merit high regard at any crag. It climbs up a faint red streak that paints the center of the wall. Gently overhanging the entire length, Masterbiner is accentuated by its finger-friendly holds and high quality stone. If the setting and appearance of the route don't awe you, the pump will!
content.protection: 8 bolts and bolted anchors. Cleaning this route on top rope is much easier than on rappel as the anchors are over the lip of the formation.

content.description: The Red Wall is one of the most impressive walls at Tam O'. This slightly overhanging wall can offer some real sports action for those that seek that kind of thrill. A variety of classic climbs ascend the reddish, white wall, including Burn Victim and Masterbiner.
